title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: Hey all, I'm not sure if this is the appropriate board to make this post on. If it's not, it can be moved to the correct board.I received a notification from the Bitcointalk Supernotifier which notifies you when there is a mention of your name on the forum. When I checked it out, what I saw was a bit strange, and I would like for someone to explain it to me because at first, I thought I was hacked. The link led me to a YouTube video, which is rather odd. Find a screenshot of the notification below.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Oh I see.  Well, it didn't work as it was supposed to because I have never felt more confused than surprised in my entire life. Hopefully, it works next year.Nice try at TryNinja you almost got me.Â  Thanks Maus0728 for your reply. I'll lock the topic now.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: It's April Fool but even you don't know what is that, it is more related to the forum issues or else, related to TriNinja bot. It does not belong to Bitcoin Discussion board and you have two options to post this thread in.Either Project Development board (in the announcement thread of that bot)or in Meta board (for forum issues).The first option is a best to move.
